EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Agile Series #1 - EMEA - Forrester - 2014.12.11.Email - Follow Up - At
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our Continuous Integration and DevOps webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Is Testing the Weakest Link in Continuous Integration and DevOps?
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for attending our webinar, ”Is Testing the Weakest Link in Continuous Integration and DevOps?”. We hope you found the webinar informative and helpful. Your active participation and engaging questions made the difference.
Click HERE for a recording of this and other webinars.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>. Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Diego Lo Giudice Vice President and Principal Analyst Forrester Research
Wolfgang Platz Founder and Chief Product Officer Tricentis
